name: DIMMA
description:
Fog, there's only fog... 

You find yourself  in a dark forest by night, with only a flashlight as a friend.
But beware, there's something else, lurking around in the forest.    
Be careful when you explore the forest of DIMMA.

Will you find a way out?

Submission of Scream Jam 2020
This game is made from the dedication and passion of PSQ - (PlayGroundSquad) - students during their free time.

Design: Leopold Collet, Massimo Mezzalira.

Code: Elias Wickander, André Skagerud

Art: Johan Malmén, Martin Frykler, Ethan Johansson
